_header: Almighty God our Father of heaven above
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 131.
_description: A paraphrase of the Pater noster — eight lines

EDU205.First Lines:
Allmychty god our fader of hewynnis hewyne abufblyssyt
                    be þi name with ws allowit alway…
EDU205.Last Lines:
…lat nocht temp ws mare þa na we suffer maybot fra al
                    ewil deliuer ws amen
EDU205.Editions:
Stevenson,  George. 
             Pieces from the Makculloch and the Gray MSS. together with The Chepman
                and Myllar Prints.
